question_text: A user reports a laptop screen is black, but the laptop seems to boot and respond. What is the best first test to diagnose the issue?
answer_options: Shine a flashlight at an angle to the screen
Connect the laptop to a wired network
correct_answer: Shine a flashlight at an angle to the screen
explanation: The flashlight test can help determine if the display image is present but the backlight has failed.
